GemP30.name: GemP30
GemP30.desc: Gives you a Sand of Time usable item. Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 6 hours of Sneaking progress for all Ninja Twins! This item restocks each day.

GemP28.name: GemP28
GemP28.desc: Gives you a random Pristine Charm in your Sneaking Inventory, which give permanent bonuses to your account! You cannot get duplicates from this. This item restocks each day.

GemP32.name: GemP32
GemP32.desc: Refills 1 life in Summoning, so you can give that battle you're stuck on one more try without waiting! This restocks every day.

EquipmentRings33.name: EquipmentRings33
EquipmentRings33.desc: All kills in World 2 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 3 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

GemP31.name: GemP31
GemP31.desc: Each purchase gives +2 daily crop instagrows every day you log in, forever. Also, each purchase gives +20% additional chance for +1 crop when fully grown.

EquipmentPendant28.name: EquipmentPendant28
EquipmentPendant28.desc: This necklace equipment comes with +42% Class EXP bonus, +5% Mob Respawn bonus, +3 Weapon Power, and +10 all stat!

EquipmentRings34.name: EquipmentRings34
EquipmentRings34.desc: All kills in World 5 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 6 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

GemP27.name: GemP27
GemP27.desc: Permanently gives you +1 Land Plot to grow crops in!

Quest82.name: Quest82
Quest82.desc: Gives you a Summoner Stone usable item Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 6 hours of Summoning Essence, instantly! This item restocks each day.

Quest81.name: Quest81
Quest81.desc: Gives you a Compost Bag usable item. Use it in your player inventory to instantly get 6 hours of Farming growth for all your crops, instantly! This item restocks each day.

GemP29.name: GemP29
GemP29.desc: Adds a shroom familiar to your Summoning Sanctuary, which gives a permanent 1.40x bonus to all Essence gain.

GemP25.name: GemP25
GemP25.desc: Gives you a random Circle Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +4% DROP RATE, +2% ALL STAT, +3% DAMAGE, and +2% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

EquipmentRings32.name: EquipmentRings32
EquipmentRings32.desc: All kills in World 4 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 5 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

Timecandy9.name: Timecandy9
Timecandy9.desc: A time candy that gives a random amount of time for a nonrandom cost of gems? How inexplicable! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs. @ 20% DISCOUNTED PRICE

EquipmentRings31.name: EquipmentRings31
EquipmentRings31.desc: All kills in World 3 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 4 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

desc: 20% OFF, usually costs 1250! Gives 500 arcade balls, directly into your arcade to be dropped!
500 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +33% better value compared to smol ball pack!
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!! Yippie!!!
